Ouch.  :(  Indeed.  Let me know if the connection guide helps out here, it should do the trick!

Packet loss is OP and it sucks!  Your network could have having issues specifically trying to reach the game server, but a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) can offer more context specific to you.  Your best bet for now would be run over each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, and test it in a custom game.
